p:
Next, we assessed the self-healing ability of copolymer PAU- g-PEG 1, which had been found to significantly enhance the adhesive force of the electrodes through strong hydrogen bonds (Fig. 3). To this end, the synthesized copolymer 1 was firstly hydrogelated using the freeze/thaw method as follows. A 35 wt% PAU- g-PEG solution was prepared and hydrogelated by freezing for 1 h at − 20 °C and thawing for 24 h at room temperature (Figure S5a)
56 .
